name: Anthony

biography.details: I’m a passionate software engineer with a strong focus on backend development, particularly in building enterprise AI platforms and observability solutions. I excel at designing scalable, reliable systems that solve complex problems and drive meaningful business impact. Recently, I’ve expanded my skill set into frontend and fullstack development, enabling me to contribute across the entire stack. I thrive on tackling challenging technical problems with a blend of creativity, precision, and a deep curiosity for emerging technologies. Outside of work, I stay active and inspired through rock climbing, bouldering, skateboarding, mountain biking, and backpacking. I also enjoy driving and immersing myself in music — whether listening, producing, drumming, or playing bass. These passions keep me balanced and fuel my creativity both on and off the keyboard.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Led initiatives for designing and developing a centralized AI platform that streamlines access to machine learning tools and services across the enterprise.
Contribute to full-stack platform roadmap, focusing on scalability, resiliency, and ease of use for data science and ML engineers.
Implement and improve platform APIs, automation, and developer experience, reducing friction in delivering ML workloads to production.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
description: Led efforts to enhance observability across AI/ML infrastructure, delivering capabilities for monitoring, logging, and tracing to support large-scale data operations.
Developed and maintained data pipelines to collect and process platform metrics, ensuring reliability and high availability.
Built dashboards and alerting systems to provide actionable insights and support system health and performance.
Supported ongoing optimization of monitoring systems to improve issue detection, root cause analysis, and system transparency.

experience.title: Software Engineer I
description: Managed and supported infrastructure for AI development environments using container orchestration and automation tools.
Developed and integrated APIs for automating workspace provisioning and lifecycle management.
Improved CI/CD workflows by enhancing pipeline configurations, leading to faster and more reliable deployments.
Provided technical support for platform users, resolving issues related to environment setup and usage.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive and modern portfolio site to showcase my projects, skills, and professional background.
projects.role: Designed and developed the site end-to-end, including layout, animations, accessibility, and deployment.
projects.learnings: Improved skills in responsive design, UI/UX accessibility, and CI/CD deployment workflows.
projects.impact: Used as a central hub for my professional presence. Helped land interviews and showcase projects clearly.

projects.name: Self-Hosted VPN + K3s Infrastructure
projects.description: A privacy-focused internal platform using Headscale, Tailscale, and K3s to manage self-hosted services securely over a private mesh network.
projects.role: Designed and deployed a fully self-hosted infrastructure stack with secure peer coordination, internal DNS, and app routing. Built for zero external dependencies.
projects.learnings: Gained hands-on experience with tailnet coordination, Traefik ingress routing, container orchestration using K3s, and secure jumpbox access for remote management.
projects.impact: In progress. Replacing third-party VPNs and SaaS tools with a zero-trust internal network. Serving as the foundation for future observability, internal development, and secure deployments.

projects.name: Budget Tracker - Bank Statement ETL
projects.description: A Python ETL pipeline that scans and extracts transaction data from Truist and TD Bank PDF statements using PlumberPDF, then generates financial insights and visualizations with Plotly inside Jupyter Notebook.
projects.role: Developed the full ETL workflow — implemented PDF parsing with PlumberPDF, transformed raw data using Pandas, and created interactive visualizations with Plotly to provide actionable financial insights.
projects.learnings: Gained hands-on experience with PDF data extraction, data cleaning, exploratory data analysis, and interactive plotting in Jupyter. Improved skills in handling messy real-world financial data.
projects.impact: Automated manual bank statement processing, reducing data prep time by 70%. Helped gain clearer insight into spending habits and cash flow trends.

projects.name: 4TLDIR
projects.description: A decentralized business directory for the Atlanta Web3 community, inspired by Yellow Pages. Enables creators, startups, DAOs, and service providers to list and discover trusted local Web3-friendly businesses.
projects.role: Lead full-stack developer — built the entire POC from scratch including user auth, listing, and submission flow. Also collaborated with local community members to shape the product vision.
projects.learnings: Gained experience building a CRUD-heavy MERN app.
projects.impact: Featured during the Atlanta Web3 Creators Showcase. Used by 5+ community members to list and discover local Web3 projects and freelancers.
